description.english: Unlocked all known Chesters!
Unlocked all Styles!
You made it off of World 0 and into the wide not-world of Space!
Wait, so not the END end? This place is just called The End?  What a stupid name; who names these things?
TTYL
Beat every main level on Easy difficulty!
Beat every main level on Normal difficulty!
Beat every main level on Hard difficulty!
Beat every main level on D: difficulty! Well done.
Unlocked the Sketch Style for use on every world!
Unlocked the LCD Style for use on every world!
Unlocked the BLOCK Style for use on every world!
Unlocked the Bit Style for use on every world!
Unlocked the Blueprint Style for use on every world!
Unlocked the End Style for use on every world!
Unlocked the Spork Style for use on every world!
Chester reached level 5!  His new watch is pretty amazing and a little game breaking.
Unlocked Sketchster!  Use his bouncing directional attack to take care of hard to hit enemies.
Sketchster reached level 5! BULLET POWER++
Unlocked Bit Chester! He comes with a charge up shot, Robit buddy, and a very important space!
Bit Chester LVMAX! Fastest Charge and MAXIMUM Robit Buddy!
Unlocked Mr. Chester!  Use his Gear Shield and devastatingly slow bullets to battle on!
Mr. Chester LVMAX!  ULTIMATE GEARS.
BLOCKSTER UNLOCKSTER!  DESTROY WITH BLOCK MINES. BAD AT JUMPING, FOR NOW.
BLOCK LMAX: QUAD JUMP!
Unlocked Chegami!  His hobbies include expelling Japanese food and being kinda weird.
Chegami LV MAX! New Meal: Cheapo Ramen!
Unlocked Chesty the Electrician!  Use his bouncing fireballs to do nothing with electricity!
Chesty lvMAX! Bullet Power++!
Unlocked The Artist Formerly Known As Chester!  Cruise around on his mimecycle tossing moons at your foes.  Ignores the elemental system, the rascal.
Mime LV MAX! Super Speed++!
Unlocked Sir Chesterworth III!  Use his umbrella to float to safety while you rain homing monocles on your foes!
Sir ChesterworthII LV MAX! Techy Monocle that Deals More Damage!
Unlocked CHST-R6!  This doesn't seem very fair.
CHHST-R6 LV MAC! Hover++
Unlocked Chestius!  Totally not a game breaker.
Chestius LV MAX! Gamebreaking++
Unlocked Chogata! Freaky slug Chester that can stop in midair using JUMP and relaunch himself!
Chogata LV MAX! Faster jump charging!
Kill 50 enemies while time is slowed by Chester's Watch!
Kill 50 enemies with your Sketch Explosion!
Robit Buddy killed 50 enemies!

displayName.english: I Do Not Think it Means What You Think it Means

description.english: Killed 50 enemies with your Gear Shield!

Killed 50 enemies with your Sushi Bombs! Maybe stop eating sushi.

You Died 50 times!

You've collected 20,000 stamps!  Think you got them all?
You collected all of the Golden Sporks!
Collected all the pieces of a mysterious ship!
Collected all Frosting Cups!  Better get the glowsticks ready.
Ate 100 Cookies to refill your special attack ammo!
Heal yourself with Bandages 100 times!

Filled up the enemy Bestiary!

description.english: Unlocked RAVE MODE!
Unlocked COLLISION DETECTION MODE!

displayName.english: Where were you? Why didn't you call?!

description.english: I was worried sick.  Gone for 15 whole minutes, the nerve.
